title: Champions in the sun
creator_credit: Films of Scotland, Templar Film Studios and Riddell Black
brief_description: Describes the Royal Highland Show at Ingliston near Edinburgh. Cattle and sheep are judged by experts, and sequences describe the background of some of the pedigree animals, explaining the features which are expected in stock of this quality. Also includes show, crafts and bands. Narrated by Douglas Murchie.
